data.text: Everything from first moment was great. We arrived at early morning and immediately got the room despite that check in just from 14:00. All personal was especially pleasant and in particular with my 6 years old daughter. I strongly recommend this apartments for everyone due to the location was perfect - 10 mins till the Metro station, supermarkets near the hotel. The bedroom bed was huge and comfortable. In the kitchen you can find everything what you need - plates, spoons, forks, pan, pots, cups and everything else. The bottle of still water we got everyday. Thank You for the warm welcome, I think we will come back.
data.title: Everything was very good

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

All of us at Savoy Suites are really touched with the wonderful review.

We are so glad to learn that we could contribute towards making your entire stay more special. We appreciate your kind words.

Creating awesome memories is indeed our prime focus and your praise and recommendation is a huge motivation for the team in this regard.

The Savoy Hotels in Dubai eagerly awaits your return many more times!

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text: Excellent stay at Savoy Suites. The restaurant staff was really polite and great Miss Neres and Miss Kim made it a wow experience . The front desk staff was also helpful. Mr Abbas and Sarfaraz ensured they helped in best possible way.  Rooms are comfortable and service is good.
data.title: Great Suites

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your warm endorsement of The Savoy Hotel and for being our guests. 

We are happy that our comfort facilities, personalized and prompt services added to the success of your staycation at the Savoy Hotels.

Team Savoy sincerely appreciates your generous words of appreciation. We look forward to welcome you back soon.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text:
Excellent service and friendly people! 
Good dinner with few people at the evening. Thanks for your great hospitality. 
Good hotel with clean rooms and correctly rooms. The city is near with using the train or taxi and good prices. We visit new Dubai and also old Dubai.
data.title: Excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is a pleasure to receive your positive comments for Savoy Suites Hotel. 

We are happy to learn that you had a pleasant stay and found our service standards to be consistent enough to merit continued visits to our hotel.

Constant efforts are put in to train our team on the importance of personalized and unobtrusive service. It is so encouraging to know that our team members are successfully delivering on this front. 

Your appreciation has been conveyed to all the staffs who all humbly thank you for the same. We hope to recreate the same experience for all your future visits.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text:
As we were in Dubai for a family get-together, we had booked 4 rooms for different dates. Prakash and his team did a fantastic  job by ensuring we got all the 4 rooms next to each other. 
Hospitality was top notch. The room was kept very clean - great attention to detail by the housekeeping staff. Nice and peaceful location. 
We had come over to celebrate my 40th birthday. It was very sweet of the hotel staff to celebrate my birthday in the lobby with cake and balloons. Lobby was well decorated with Xmas tree & decorations. 
There is a pool on the roof terrace. My daughter loved it!
data.title: Thanks for making our stay in Dubai memorable

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

The entire team at Savoy Suites thank you for taking time to post your experience. 

Your compliments for our services have been shared with all the staffs. We are delighted to learn that we could make your stay memorable. 

It is our constant endeavor to deliver our best. Your appreciation increases our motivation to continually aspire to meet and exceed the guests’ expectations. 

The Savoy Hotels, with its convenient location in the centre of the city in Dubai, is close to the business, financial and shopping arcades, making it an ideal hotel both for a business traveller as well as for a family get-away.

We look forward to welcome you back soon.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny

data.text:
I've already stayed more than  three times,
The stay was lovely, loved the breakfast which was included.
Very helpfull and kind staff. 
Good service. 
Nice and clean accomodations. Highly recommendable hotel.
data.title: The stay was lovely

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

It is most kind of you to share your experience with other guests and we appreciate you for taking your valuable time to write this review. 

Savoy Suites Hotel strives to blend service & comfort with efficiency at the hands of enthusiastic staff offering a warm welcome and unparalleled levels of hospitality. Thank you for your generous words of appreciation for all the staffs which means a lot to us.

We look forward to welcome you back to your home at the Savoy Hotels in Dubai.

With sincerity in service,

Faroukh Sunny. 
Group General Manager 
Savoy Hotels – Dubai
owner_response.author: Faroukh Sunny
